# stellar-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                                                                                           | Type                                     |
| ------------- | ------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| `active`      | `active`      | Sets the button or link as an active state.                                                           | `boolean`                                |
| `block`       | `block`       | Sets the button or link to render at full width to the parent.                                        | `boolean`                                |
| `danger`      | `danger`      | Sets the button or link to provide the affordance of a dangerous action.                              | `boolean`                                |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`    | Sets the button or link as disabled and not-interactable.                                             | `boolean`                                |
| `for`         | `for`         | Sets the href on the anchor tag if the button is a link.                                              | `string`                                 |
| `ghost`       | `ghost`       |                                                                                                       | `boolean`                                |
| `href`        | `href`        | Sets the href on the anchor tag if the button is a link.                                              | `string`                                 |
| `icon`        | `icon`        | Sets the button or link as a button with only an icon.                                                | `boolean`                                |
| `invert`      | `invert`      | Sets the button or link as an outlined button.                                                        | `boolean`                                |
| `label`       | `label`       | Sets accessibility options on the buttons                                                             | `string`                                 |
| `name`        | `name`        | Sets the name on the button if the button is an input. Allows the button to act as an item in a form. | `string`                                 |
| `outline`     | `outline`     | Sets the button or link as an outlined button.                                                        | `boolean`                                |
| `padding`     | `padding`     | Sets the padding inside of the button. Can be small, medium, or large.                                | `string|"small"|"medium"|"large"`        |
| `pill`        | `pill`        | Sets the button or link to render as a pill.                                                          | `boolean`                                |
| `processable` | `processable` | Sets the button or link as processing when clicked.                                                   | `boolean`                                |
| `size`        | `size`        | Sets the size of the button. Can be tiny, small, medium, or large.                                    | `string|"tiny"|"small"|"medium"|"large"` |
| `tag`         | `tag`         | Allows the button to render for different tags.                                                       | `"button"|"submit"|"link"|"span"`        |
| `target`      | `target`      | Sets the target on the anchor tag if the button is a link.                                            | `string`                                 |
| `value`       | `value`       | Sets the value on the button if the button is an input.                                               | `string`                                 |
